Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
·         Each team shall consist of eleven players on the field, however a team may begin a game with as few as eight

·         A minimum of 4 players from both genders is required to be on the field at all times.

·         A Maximum of 3 competitive players are allowed on the team roster.

·         All players must check in using a valid I-card.

·         If during a game a team has fewer than five eligible players due to ejection, the game shall be terminated.

·         If during a game a team has fewer than five eligible players due to injury, the game may continue at the official's discretion.

Substitutions

·         Substituting may occur during your team's throw-in, your team's corner kick or any goal kick, after a goal is scored and any time that the opposing team is substituting a player.

·         Substitutes shall go to their team entry position and cannot enter the game until the player they are replacing is completely off of the field.

·         A player who receives a yellow card must be substituted.

·         During an injury, both teams may substitute only if the injured player is substituted. A player that is bleeding must be substituted from the game.

·         Any player may change places with the goalkeeper, provided the official is informed before the change is made and the change is made during a stoppage in play.
